      • extractAndResizePicture

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage extractAndResizePicture(ImageData img,
                                                                   PatcheInformation pi,
                                                                   int targetWidth,
                                                                   int targetHeight,
                                                                   int method)
        Extract a subimage (pi.getW()*pi.getH) of img from pi.getX() to pi.getY() and resize it in a patch of targetWidth*targetHeight
        Parameters:
        img - Image object which contains the original image
        pi - Information (x,y,w,h) about the extraction
        targetWidth - Width of the patch
        targetHeight - Height of the patch
        method - Method use for resize
        Returns:
        Patch
